name: Telegram Auto Anime Upload Bot
description: A Telegram Auto Anime in Pyrogram by @i_manjot_sidhu

MAIN_CHANNEL.description: ID of Channel Where Anime Will Upload.

CLOUD_CHANNEL.description: ID of Channel Where Samples And Screenshots Of Anime Will Be Uploaded.

FFMPEG.description: You Can Set Custom Path Of ffmpeg if u want, default is ffmpeg.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: ID of Channel Where Status Of Proccesses Will Be Shown.

SEND_SCHEDULE.description: True/False Send Schedule of Upcoming Anime of that day at 00:30 IST, default is False.

BACKUP_CHANNEL.description: ID of Channel Where Anime Will Be Saved As BackUP.

RESTART_EVERDAY.description: True/False It Will Restart The Bot Everyday At 00:30 IST, default is True.
